name: AudioSegmenter
descr: AudioSegmenter is a tool to segment audio files into several tracks. Bounds of the tracks are indicated in an annotated file of any format supported by SPPAS (xra, TextGrid, eaf, ...). New in version 3: A video can also be segmented.
